value:
$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|Your wounds seem to have healed
some, $Nu...$k$pAnd the color has returned to your
face as well. Can you stand?$k$pDon't overdo it...$k$pI'm sure you will be back on your
feet in no time.$k$pYou need not thank me.$k$pI helped you because...I was alone.$k$pIf you were to die, I would
be alone again...$k$p...$k$pWill you...tell me once more of the
Kingdom of Askr—the tale of you
and your friends?$k$p$EFace_Smile|I could listen to those stories
over and over again...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|This direction... I sense the distant
presence of $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Let's hurry, before it's too late.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_クワシル,ch00_48_Kvasir_F_Normal,Face|Look, $Nu...$k$pI found something strange here
in the spring.$k$pIs it a weapon? It has an odd shape
to it, doesn't it?$k$pO-oh! This is yours? This is the...
divine weapon Breidablik?$k$pIt must have fallen into the water
when you arrived in the ravine.$k$pStrangely enough, though, I have
collected another one of this same
sort of weapon.$k$p$bEvBG_v0704b_S7063_ED|$WmMPID_クワシル,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|This one shines with a golden light...
while the other does not. Which of
the two is yours?$k$pRemember...to lie to a goddess
is to ask for punishment.$k$pIf it is indeed yours, then I shall
return it to you.$k$p$Sbs150|
